
Question
========
Multicollinearity exists if:

Answerlist
----------
* the measurement errors (‘errors’) are not normally distributed.
* The relationship between at least one of the X variables and the Y variable is non-linear.
* The variance of the measurement errors is not constant across the X-variables.
* the explanatory variables are highly correlated among themselves.
